comments:

Before the error occurs, the "Progress Information" dialog keeps open with the 
message "Launching TestQuery ..." (where "TestQuery" is the main class of my 
application). and it happens when i changed the code and press the run icon 
(without saving explicitaly so that automatic saving will save the changes).

Now, this bug occurs even when i just save changes in a Java editor with 
CTRL+S, but a slitely different stack trace:

We changed the method signature for that method a couple of months ago.  I think
we'll need to drop an updated core tools build on the web.

I have released a new version of core tools to the core team web page. Can you
update your core tools plugins with this version (1.0.1) and let us know if the
problem persists?  Here is the link (probably broken over two lines):

http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-core-home/downloads/tools/org.eclipse.core.tools_1.0.1.zip
so far, the bug doesn't occur with the core 1.0.1 version... :-]

Ok, I will mark as fixed.  Please re-open if you continue to see the problem
with tools 1.0.1.
